dc_creator_sm: New York (N.Y.). Department of City Planning
dc_description_s: Bronx, NY tax block base map. The New York City tax block base map is part of the Department of City Planning's ongoing COGIS project. The tax blocks in conjuction with the tax lots provide a schematic overview of New York City's tax geography.
dc_publisher_s: New York (N.Y.). Department of City Planning
dc_subject_sm: New York (State). Department of Taxation and Finance
